Wholesale.title: Wholesale
Wholesale.subtitle: PDR EQUIPMENT PRODUCTION SINCE 2017
Wholesale.text: Safi Group has been manufacturing and selling PDR equipment since 2017. Safi Group, which responds to domestic and international demands with high production volume, also uses its own manufactured equipment in the services it provides to end users. Whether you are a professional or semi-professional, our products appeal to everyone interested in this field.

Video.title: Our promotional video is online
Video.text: As Safi Group, with our competent, experienced management team and more than 50 professional craftsmen in the field,
Video.text-last: we provide service at our branches above.

Cargo.title: INTERNATIONAL CARGO
Cargo.subtitle: SENDING TO ALL OVER THE WORLD
Cargo.text: Safi Group sends its products both domestically and internationally. It provides shipment by air, land, or sea according to the customer's preference.

Produce.title: High Production Capacity
Produce.subtitle: 450 M2 PRODUCTION FACILITY
Produce.text: Safi Group manufactures PDR equipment in its 450 m2 production facility with an advanced machinery lineup. In this production facility, it produces all PDR-related products such as large, regular, flat, and curved bars, PDR lighting products, workbenches, and dents of different sizes.
